reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2005, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Anna and Abel have created an amazing oasis of calm, great food / drink and above all an incredible warmth towards all the guests. We chose here for our honeymoon and liked it so much we cancelled the second place we were supposed to be staying at, and then came back again a year later.
reviews.title: Perfection!
to the Manoir born!
reviews.text: It is a beautiful property run by a very special couple. The 'special touches' are plentiful and evening dinner is an amazing experience.

reviews.title: summer holidays
reviews.text: Total relaxation is guaranteed - the local area is quiet but beautiful and Anna and Abel have plenty of good suggestions as to what to do.

reviews.title: Exceptional Quality at a Fair Price
reviews.text: I can't speak highly enough of this place.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A group of 12 of us just returned from a visit to le Manoir celebrating a certain birthday. It is a lovely house in a great setting, with luxurious rooms and food to die for. Best of all Anna and Abel made us feel totally at home - we can't wait to go back and have some more cooking lessons, massages form Anna and explore more of the Dordogne
reviews.title: the perfect venue for our 40th wedding anniversary

likes.liked: — tranquil location,stunning views, wonderful hosts ans seriously good food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Dawn and I have just come back from Le Manoir de Malagorse and we have had such a delightfull stay!!!! What a surprise!!! We have been travelling a lot in our time and stayed at so many places and we are so carrefull about booking and worried about finding new places. Our hollidays are so important to us (beeing in the catering trade ourselves) and we do take a lot of care about choosing a place or recommending one if that matter!!!!
reviews.title: The most charming and elegant Dinner Bed & Breakfast we have ever stayed in

likes.liked: — The comfort, the Food and wine, the location and character and the hosts
